overview:
What makes TheStepnee.com the best city site? Itâ€™s simple! We have focused on making it simple for you to search for ever city information you need. Tagline â€“ Where you get stuck, we help you to proceed. One stopâ€¦ Straight to the point.

TheStepnee.com, also known as TS, is the ultimate directory that provides information about the most interesting and exciting features of a town. The simple and uncluttered design makes TS the perfect resource, whether planning a trip, thinking about relocating or wanting to buy a gift for a friend or relative in another town. Forget the long and tedious searches normally required to gather information about a particular destination â€¦ lodging, dining, attractions, specialty shopping, activities, events, recreation, weather, maps and reservations, it is all included on our site, and easy to find. TheStepnee.com has created a vast network businesses of all sizes across the Udaipur and listed their data FREE to assure the user of a complete guide, a one-stop source of information.

Mission: To develop an internet web site that will be a valuable tool for the traveler and shopper in discovering the most interesting and unique places to visit or shop while simultaneously providing the independent merchant with significant internet presence.

Objective: To provide a simple and direct route via the Internet for the traveler and locals to obtain reliable information needed in making plans to visit a particular destination for the shopper to obtain reliable information about specialty shops they may contact to purchase the perfect gift for a friend or relative who lives in another town and to create interest and excitement about each town by presenting information in a brief narrative review and making recommendations of things not to be missed.

Focus: To showcase the better goods and services that are sought by the discriminative traveler and shopper primarily in the areas of dining, lodging, attractions, antiques, art, artist and craftsmen, galleries and museums, specialty shops, gardens and parks, activities and events.
